featured.text: The park was built by Gordon Hartman, a former real estate developer.

definition.zh_def: 戈登，一個常見的英語男性名字，源自蘇格蘭地名，通常用作姓氏或名字。
definition.en_def: Gordon is a common male given name of Scottish origin, often used as a surname.
definition.example: Gordon is planning to travel to Scotland next summer.
